server, per server, per directory.

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
I believe what you are looking for is along the lines of mod_throttle:
http://www.snert.com/Software/mod_throttle/
But I don't know of any 2.0 version of this or similar modules.

Note that it is not as easy a problem as the loadaverage thing, because you need
to coordinate among all the processes/threads.  It is, however, a fairly
frequently-requested feature on the user forums.

My main problem is still that PHP as CGI can cause a DOS in Apache. I've so far
found no way to prevent this, and now I'm searchig for something :-)
creator: floeff@arcor.de
